moveFish

protected Coordinate moveFish(Fish fish,
                              Coordinate from,
                              Coordinate to)
Moves a single fish one step, possibly overwriting any fish the fish moves into.

Specified by:
moveFish in class FishMatrix
Parameters:
fish - The fish to set at the new location.
from - The coordinate where the fish should be removed.
to - The coordinate where the fish should be moved to.
Returns:
The new coordinate of the fish.

moveAllFish

public void moveAllFish()
Moves all fish one iteration, the most important method of this applet. We iterate all rows from up to down and all columns from left to right.

We maintain an array moved in order to remember if a fish has already been moved. Otherwise some fish could move more than one step in each phase.

Specified by:
moveAllFish in class FishMatrix

numberSharks -
